DOC.brief_summary: To measure arm function quality life mastectomy patient .
DOC.brief_title: Arm Function Quality Life Following Mastectomy .
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment : Randomized one two treatment arm . Group One : Basic active exercise program home . Group Two : Instruction active exercise program along additional exercise use exercise equipment stretch exercise . Range Motion measurement take first session , 1 month , 6 week , 3 month , 6 month 1 year . Patients complete demographic form , functional questionnaire , QOL questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Patients refer UNMH CRTC treatment follow mastectomy/lumpectomy surgery . Not specify
